positions.description:
Performed light secretarial duties including filings when needed. 
Created Table of Contents and Table of Authorities.
Created shells to discovery documents including Form Interrogatories, Special Interrogatories, Requests for Admission, and Request for Production.
Created shells to Separate Statements for Motions to Compel
Created and Organized Trial Binders 
Managed expenses- uploaded expenses to Bill4Time, uploaded invoices to billing systems (i.e. Legal Exchange, Collaborati). 
Managed Firm Calendaring for 6 months
Processed Mail- scanned, saved, and sent documents to corresponding attorneys
Maintained Organization of Firm's files and cabinets 
Managed MCLE 
Trained New Employees on Firm Protocol 
Managed all Firm IT- Computer Systems, Backing up of Files, Printer Systems
Developed Protocol Manuals for the Firm- these manuals included Calendaring, Uploading to Billing Systems, Printer Maintenance, End of Month Expenses

positions.title: Legal Assistant

positions.description:
Founding member of Global Law Brigades at UC Irvine. Created a sustainable foundation for the organization at UC Irvine. Traveled to Torti, Panama to provide free legal assistance to the community. The main concern for this rural community in Panama was property rights, so myself along with the other members of the organization drafted property contracts for those in the community. 

Research Assistant to Professor Diego Vigil
